    public class JetCombo<E>
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasEnabled, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.HasChangeHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable
    A very cool ListBox wrapper.
    Author:
    smuzzopappa & fpugnali

    • Constructor Detail

      • JetCombo

        public JetCombo(String descriptor,
        boolean hasSelectedItem,
        boolean isMultipleSelect)
        A disabled JetCombo with a "Cargando" unique item. It will be enabled again when add or addAll is called.
        Parameters:
        hasSelectedItem - - if true, adds "Seleccione..." as first item.
        descriptor - - the property to display in the combo box
        isMultipleSelect - - if true, makes the combo as multiple select.

      • JetCombo

        public JetCombo(String descriptor,
        boolean hasSelectedItem)
        A disabled JetCombo with a "Cargando" unique item. It will be enabled again when add or addAll is called.
        Parameters:
        hasSelectedItem - - if true, adds "Seleccione..." as first item.
        descriptor - - the property to display in the combo box. Generated combo will not be multiple select.

      • JetCombo

        public JetCombo(String descriptor)

      • JetCombo

        public JetCombo(List<E> list,
        String descriptor,
        boolean hasSeleccioneItem)
        A JetCombo with a "Seleccione" first item and a list of objects to choose from.
        Parameters:
        list - - the backup list, it will be internally copied
        descriptor - - the property to display in the combo box

      • JetCombo

        String descriptor)

      • addCreateNewElement

        public void addCreateNewElement(String description,
                       CreateNewHandler createNewHandler)
        Adds a last element that will call back the handler when selected. It is mainly used for creating new elements but could contain and do anything.
        Parameters:
        description - - the displayed name for the element
        createNewHandler - - the handler to be called when the element is selected
